Name: Sacred Martell
Ingredients: Top up with Thomas Henry Tonic Water
Instructions: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with tonic water.
Review: Cognac is freshened with lemon juice and tonic water, while elderflower liqueur adds subtle sweet floral notes.
History: Created in 2015 by Gilles De Hondt at Casino Oostende in Oostende, Belgium.
Nutrition: One serving of Sacred Martell contains 188 calories
